entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 01:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: N 11 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
